verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
Wave the answer
back to heaven,
“By Thy grace we will.”

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Ho, my comrades,
see the signal,
waving in the sky!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Reinforcements
now appearing,
victory is nigh.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
See the mighty
host advancing,
Satan leading on,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Mighty ones around
us falling,
courage almost gone!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
See the glorious
banner waving,
Hear the trumpet blow!

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
In our Leader’s Name
we triumph
over every foe.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Fierce and long
the battle rages,
but our help is near,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Onward comes
our great Commander,
cheer, my comrades, cheer!
